data.name: CreateDashboardStagingPriority35
ReadCseOrganization
data.value: select ORGANZTN_ID, TYPE_CODE from CKT_CSE_ORGANIZATN where TYPE_CODE = 'J' order by ORGANZTN_ID

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority1
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, ORD_EST_DAYS_NMR, ORD_EST_DAYS_DNOM, ORD_EST_DAYS_AVG from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = 'JD'

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority2
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, ORD_EST_DAYS_NMR, ORD_EST_DAYS_DNOM, ORD_EST_DAYS_AVG from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 with(xlock) where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel and REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId

data.name: ReadLegalActionLegalActionFipsTribunal
data.value: select * from ( select LEGAL_ACTION_ID, CLASSIFICATION, ACTION_TAKEN, FILED_DT, STANDARD_NO, ESTABLISHMENT_CD, TRB_ID from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where (FILED_DT between cast(@date1 as date) and cast(@date2 as date)) and STANDARD_NO >= @standardNo and (ESTABLISHMENT_CD in ('CS', 'CT')) and CLASSIFICATION = 'J' and ( ACTION_TAKEN in ('DEFJPATJ', 'DFLTSUPJ', 'JEF', 'MEDEXPJ', 'PATERNJ', 'PATMEDJ', 'PATONLYJ', 'SUPPORTJ', 'VOLPATTJ', 'VOLSUPTJ', 'VOL718BJ', '718BDEFJ', '718BJERJ') ) ) S1 outer apply ( select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, CLASSIFICATION, ACTION_TAKEN, FILED_DT, STANDARD_NO, ESTABLISHMENT_CD from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where STANDARD_NO = S1.STANDARD_NO and FILED_DT < @date1 and (ESTABLISHMENT_CD in ('CS', 'CT')) and CLASSIFICATION = 'J' and ( ACTION_TAKEN in ('DEFJPATJ', 'DFLTSUPJ', 'JEF', 'MEDEXPJ', 'PATERNJ', 'PATMEDJ', 'SUPPORTJ', 'VOLPATTJ', 'VOLSUPTJ', 'VOL718BJ', '718BDEFJ', '718BJERJ') ) ) S2 outer apply ( select top(1) FIP_STATE, FIP_COUNTY, FIP_LOCATION, TRIBUNAL_NM, JUDICIAL_DISTRICT, IDENTIFIER from CKT_TRIBUNAL where IDENTIFIER = S1.TRB_ID and FIP_LOCATION is not null and FIP_COUNTY is not null and FIP_STATE is not null and FIP_COUNTY > 0 ) S3 order by S1.STANDARD_NO, S1.FILED_DT

data.name: ReadLegalReferralCase
data.value: select T1.CAS_NUMBER, T1.IDENTIFIER, T1.STATUS_DATE, T1.STATUS, T1.REFERRAL_DATE, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_1, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_2, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_3, T1.REFERRAL_REASON_4 from CKT_LEGAL_REFERRAL T1 where ( (T1.STATUS in ('O', 'S')) and T1.STATUS_DATE <= @statusDate or (T1.STATUS in ('R', 'W', 'C')) and T1.STATUS_DATE >= @statusDate ) and exists ( select * from CKT_LEG_REF_CROLE T3 join CKT_LEGAL_ACT_PERS T6 on T3.CRO_TYPE = 'CH' and T3.CSP_NUMBER = T6.CSP_NUMBER and @lgaIdentifier = T6.LGA_IDENTIFIER join CKT_LA_PER_LA_CROL T7 on T6.LA_PERSON_ID = T7.LAP_ID and T7.CRO_TYPE = 'CH' and T3.CSP_NUMBER = T7.CSP_NUM and @lgaIdentifier = T7.LGA_ID where T1.IDENTIFIER = T3.LGR_ID and T1.CAS_NUMBER = T3.CAS_NUMBER and T1.CAS_NUMBER = T3.CAS_NUMBER_ROLE and T1.CAS_NUMBER = T7.CAS_NUM ) order by T1.REFERRAL_DATE desc

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority35
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 set AS_OF_DATE = @asOfDate, ORD_EST_DAYS_NMR = @ordEstDaysNmr, ORD_EST_DAYS_DNOM = @ordEstDaysDnom, ORD_EST_DAYS_AVG = @ordEstDaysAvg where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel and REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId
